MOHID module¶

MOHID handles the data preparation for the operation day. It imports Delft3D data and krige the updated field based on the forecast data from MOHID data source.

class MOHID.MOHID¶

Bases: object

Load setup.

static get_dataset() → ndarray¶

Return dataset of Delft3D. .. rubric:: Example

dataset = np.array([[lat, lon, salinity]])
